name: Controlled useState
description: Dependent dropdowns for country and city selection with controlled components using useState hook
approach: Uses React's useState hook to manage selected country and city states. Implements dependent dropdown logic with useMemo for efficient city filtering. Provides form validation and console logging.
features: City dropdown disabled until country selected
Console logging in required format: { country, city }
Bootstrap form styling with responsive design
Country details panel with city list
Statistics panel showing totals and averages
Edge case handling for countries with no cities
